DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this study is to compare benefits and disadvantages in using continuous infusion of morphine or fentanyl for post operative analgesia.
DOC.brief_title: Post Operative Pain Control: Morphine vs Fentanyl
DOC.criteria: ASA 1 or 2 patients undergoing major gynaecological surgery age > 60 years obesity (BMI>30 Kg/m2) cardiac and respiratory diseases renal impairment liver disorders allergies to any drug used in the study
